course_title: Staying Healthy in Pediatrics: Introduction to Clinical Specialty
course_description: In this course, students will develop skills to deliver standard-based well care to children and their families. Emphasis is placed on integrating advanced pediatric health assessment with health promotion and heath maintenance tailored to the individual pediatric patient and family.
prerequisites: NRSG 524 and NRSG 554 or equivalent transfer credit as corequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 3032, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 10-11:50a, Instructor: I. Reyes, Status: Open
